description: This file is a PHP source code that generates a web interface for configuring MoCA (Multimedia over Coax Alliance) settings on a network gateway. It includes server-side PHP logic for retrieving current configurations, user session handling, and dynamic content rendering, as well as client-side JavaScript for interactive form handling and validation.

methods.name: next_step
methods.description: JavaScript function to collect form data, perform validation, construct configuration JSON, and send AJAX request to apply the MoCA settings.
